history.proof: intros a b H. sauto q: on depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: In environment a, b : nat H : a * b = 0 The term "H" has type "a * b = 0" while it is expected to have type "b <> 0".

original: intros a b H. specialize (Nat.pow_eq_0 a b H). intros [Hab | Hb]. - left. symmetry. apply Nat.mod_eq. apply H. - right. apply Hab.
